From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Plintissa looked at Liono.

"Hello again, Liono, I trust your still mad at me. Well I work for the
Maximals again, and my group has much power to crush the Predacons and the
Alliance both!" Plintissa said. Dracona pointed to herself and then smashed
her fist into her hand while growling. Plintissa nodded to her, some
language only understood by the People's Group.

Outside, the Radicons were invited inside the base by Plintissa, but they
didn't know what to do, they were never invited anywhere and were exited.
The Radicons walked past the autoguns, relived that they didn't fire, and
walked into the war room. Most of the Radicons were very pleasd to see Liono
Prime and were exited, but Stranato could care less, he just nodded to Liono
as the Radicons all sat down.

Sinesis and sinister would not come into the base even though Plintissa had
asked them to. Sinesis jumped into the lake for a swim. Sinesis had pulled
Sinister with him, and that's when Sinister realized that he was a
prehistoric scorpion that could breath underwater. Another advantage for the
brothers.

"We shall soon rule the maxiand the Alliance and bring them to the mercy of
the Predacons!" Sinesis said.

"But don't forget, even the Predacons are threats!" Sinister pointed out.
Sinesis nodded ann they lay in wait in the lake...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 3:12 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
>
> * Iron Raptor looked over at Prowl as she heard his concern about her
injuries, i being expected had lessened the annoyance in which she felt when
he had finally said it.
> She really didn't care if she was injured but knew that if she didn't go
and repair she would then end up getting raged on by Prowl that it was the
best thing for her, so there was no real choice other then to give in.
> Iron Raptor growled at the fact of being defeated when it was only common
sense to be worried about her, but when she heard Striker suggest that they
just both get repaired and then meet later it was a bit better of a
suggestion.*
>
> " Oh, alright."
>
> * She hated the fact that she was forced to postpone solving Ramhorn's and
Plintissa's problem but she really hated to see Prowl worry about her and
hated just as much to HEAR him worry, his comments on her needing repair but
also not thinking that he needed to as well.
> But then to add a bit of a light side to the predicament she decided to
cast the pain away from her thought as best she could and force a slight
smil...as well as a mock sly look on her face.
> She then looked straight at Prowl so he would get the point.*
>
> " But only if we share chambers..."
>
> * The comment was ment as nothing more then a joke to lighten the
atmosphere, but if Prowl took it another way...she had no problem with
that.*
>
>
